content.question: In line 10, perfusus sanie vittas is translated

choices.label: having poured forth his life with gore
his lifeâ€™s blood having been poured forth

content.answer: soaked in gore with respect to his headbands

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
